column4: [21:16] <QUILz> Anscombe: Are you sure 1024x768 is your monitor's native resolution? - I can't be 100% positive, it's a toshiba laptop. How can I find out?
So I don't know why it's fuzzy. Screen refresh rate is 60hz which is correct.
I found setting up a Nvidia card to be a pain. You're best downloading the nvidia-settings tool and running it as sudo then letting it update your xconf file
